comments.content:
My guess:

Heavyweight Futura Condensed for Nr. 1.  
Impact for Nr. 2.

Hi Julien,

[that](http://web.archive.org/web/20100607024302/http:/www.wasted-german-youth.com/info1.htm) looks like [Futura Extra Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20100607024302/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/futura_std_extra_bold_condensed_ot/?sample_text=WASTED%20GERMAN%20YOUTH&sample_size=36&acs_ss=-1&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1) and [Impact](http://web.archive.org/web/20100607024302/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=impact&x=0&y=0&sample_text=WE%20CAME%20TO%20PLAY&sample_size=48).  
F
Geez, that fiddly link finding takes waaay too much time … ;°)

thank you veeeeery much, guys :)

yay i am happy to know this
